-- input --
Col1,Col2,Col3
1,longish,a
2,short,b
3.0,foo,c
-- defaults --
-- want --
Col1, Col2   , Col3
   1, longish, a   
   2, short  , b   
 3.0, foo    , c   
-- as markdown --
-md
-- want --
| Col1 | Col2    | Col3 |
| ---: | ------- | ---- |
|    1 | longish | a    |
|    2 | short   | b    |
|  3.0 | foo     | c    |
